sentence.Network_en: Silber says the tax rollback would decimate basic services for the needy.
sentence.Network_cn: 西尔伯说税收的回落可能会大大减少为贫困人口提供的基本服务。

sentence.Network_en: Although he was poor, he was quite generous to his needy friends.
sentence.Network_cn: 他虽穷, 但对贫苦的朋友很慷慨.

sentence.Network_en: Needy and handicapped people depend on government relief for their support.
sentence.Network_cn: 穷人和残疾人依靠政府的救济维持生计.

entry.def: Needy people do not have enough food, medicine, or clothing, or adequate houses.

example.ex: ...a multinational force aimed at ensuring that food and medicine get to needy Somalis.
example.tran: 旨在确保将食物和药品送至贫困的索马里民众手中的多国部队

means.word_mean: 1. poor enough to need help from others

helping the children of poor and needy parents

sentences.en: They awarded scholarships to needy students.
sentences.cn: 他们给贫苦学生颁发奖学金。

sentences.en: The previously free (= not paid for) distribution of text books will now be confined to students who are needy.
